description: Plumbago (Ceratostigma plumbaginoides) is a true showstopper in the garden or landscape. Brilliant blue flowers blanket the plant from summer all the way through autumn. Not only is the flower display beautiful – the foliage of the Plumbago is also amazing. Long, deep green leaves make a compact mound, and through autumn they turn hues of yellow and russet. If you’re looking for a low maintenance, hardy plant with year-round interest, then Plumbago is perfect for you. It thrives in sunny, well-drained and dry conditions, and does well in even the harshest of soils.
